io.atomix.catalyst.util

Class PropertiesReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.catalyst.util.PropertiesReader

  • public final class PropertiesReader
extends Object
    Utility for reading configuration information from properties.

      • load

        public static PropertiesReader load(String propertiesFile)
        Loads a properties reader for the given properties file on the local filesystem.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - The properties file for which to load the reader.
        Returns:
        A new properties reader.

      • getCollection

        public <T> Collection<T> getCollection(String prefix,
                                       Function<String,T> factory)
        Reads a collection of properties based on a prefix.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The collection value type.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix for which to read properties.
        factory - The factory to call for each property name in the collection.
        Returns:
        The collection.

      • getMap

        public <K,V> Map<K,V> getMap(String prefix,
                             Function<String,K> keyFactory,
                             Function<String,V> valueFactory)
        Returns a map of properties for a given prefix.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The map key type.
        V - The map value type.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix for which to return a map of property values.
        keyFactory - A converter function to convert the map keys.
        valueFactory - A converter function to convert the map values.
        Returns:
        The map.
